string-array.name: demos
string-array.item: Dinja Bomb (Tilt)\n\nA texturized dinja bomb object controlled with a TiltForceInputController.
World (Drag)\n\nA texturized world sphere controlled with a DragController.
Dancing Letters (Animated)\n\nSome dancing letters animated using animators.
Sphere (Custom Shader)\n\nA rotating sphere with a custom shader attached.
